mapper.insert: insert into shop (shop_id, shop_name, shop_psw, shop_tel, shop_add, shop_img, delivery_fee, shop_proclamation, month_sales, order_num, collection_num, city_id, province_id, shop_lat, shop_lon, shop_createtime, shop_status) values (#{shopId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{shopName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shopPsw,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shopTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shopAdd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shopImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deliveryFee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shopProclamation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{monthSales,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{collectionNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{provinceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{shopLat,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{shopLon,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{shopCreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{shopStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update shop set shop_name = #{shopName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shop_psw = #{shopPsw,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shop_tel = #{shopTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shop_add = #{shopAdd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shop_img = #{shopImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, delivery_fee = #{deliveryFee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shop_proclamation = #{shopProclamation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, month_sales = #{monthSales,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_num = #{orderNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, collection_num = #{collectionNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, city_id = #{cityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, province_id = #{provinceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, shop_lat = #{shopLat,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, shop_lon = #{shopLon,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, shop_createtime = #{shopCreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, shop_status = #{shopStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where shop_id = #{shopId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select shop_id, shop_name, shop_psw, shop_tel, shop_add, shop_img, delivery_fee, shop_proclamation, month_sales, order_num, collection_num, city_id, province_id, shop_lat, shop_lon, shop_createtime, shop_status from shop where shop_id = #{shopId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select shop_id, shop_name, shop_psw, shop_tel, shop_add, shop_img, delivery_fee, shop_proclamation, month_sales, order_num, collection_num, city_id, province_id, shop_lat, shop_lon, shop_createtime, shop_status from shop

select shop_id, shop_name, shop_psw, shop_tel, shop_add, shop_img, delivery_fee, shop_proclamation, month_sales, order_num, collection_num, city_id, province_id, shop_lat, shop_lon, shop_createtime ,shop_status from shop where shop_tel = #{shopTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
